name: Joe Trohman
description:
'''Joseph Mark Trohman''' (born September 1, 1984) is an American musician. He is best known as the lead guitarist and backing vocalist of the American rock band [[Fall Out Boy]], as well as the lead guitarist for heavy metal supergroup [[the Damned Things]]. Fall Out Boy began in 2001 as Trohman and [[Pete Wentz]]'s side project from the hardcore punk scene they were involved with, and the band has scored four number one albums on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]], as well as numerous platinum and multi platinum singles in the US and abroad.

After a five-year hiatus, Fall Out Boy announced a comeback with a [[Save Rock and Roll|new album]], tour, and [[My Songs Know What You Did in the Dark (Light Em Up)|single]] in February 2013. Since then, the band has released four full-length albums, along with two EPs, [[Make America Psycho Again|a remix album]], and [[Greatest Hits: Believers Never Die â€“ Volume Two|a second greatest-hits compilation]].
